name: Rolling Toolman 2 Deathly Traps
description:
Story:

Player are Toolman inside ball in this roller ball game. Every level player mission is to reach goal. Controls are difficult and player need avoid deathly traps in each level. There are several different traps like shooting cannon, guillotine, rotating blades, moving spikes etc. If health goes to 0 player need play level again
End of every level there are star which gives player steam achievements. So be a roller king and avoid different traps

Features:

- 15 levels
- Steam Achievements
- Try to beat every level and collect achievements
- Health system
- Damageable traps: Shooting cannon, guillotine, rotating blades, moving spikes, dynamite
